mapper.select: SELECT g.GYM_NO, g.GYM_TITLE, g.GYM_CONTENT, g.GYM_WRITE_DATE, g.GYM_UPDATE_DATE, g.GYM_DEL_FL, g.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_LAST_NAME , m.MEMBER_FIRST_NAME FROM GYM g JOIN MEMBER m ON g.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY g.GYM_NO
SELECT g.*, m.MEMBER_LAST_NAME, m.MEMBER_FIRST_NAME FROM GYM g LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON g.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE g.GYM_NO = #{gymNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GYM (GYM_NO, GYM_TITLE, GYM_CONTENT, GYM_WRITE_DATE, GYM_DEL_FL, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (GYM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gymTitle}, #{gymContent} , SYSDATE , 0, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, GYM.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM GYM ORDER BY GYM_NO DESC ) GYM WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} + #{offset} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{offset} + 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GYM g JOIN MEMBER m ON g.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO
